attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By introducing a £1.00 per CO2 Emission Car Tax Rate (Vehicle Excise Duty) which would be Fairer to All. Easier to work out and to administer, Cars under 100g/km would remain exempt. This would reduce by 10g/km per year. Showroom Tax from 2009 still applies.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
